pageTitle: McQ - Alexander McQueen Tailored Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 34in / 86.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, Portugal. Dry clean. Trim: 100% polyester. Shell: 100% cotton. Fabric: Mid-weight twill. Designed in a tailored silhouette with menswear-inspired details, this McQ - Alexander McQueen dress cuts a clean, edgy line. Black trim makes a graphic contrast to clean white twill, trimming the wide snap collar and split V neckline. Double-striped sides add a bold element, and the vented hem creates a smooth drape. Hidden side zip. Lined. Description McQ - Alexander McQueen > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Alexander McQueen’s iconic penchant for pushing boundaries is evident in the design aesthetic of his contemporary line McQ - Alexander McQueen. The label is informed by its creator’s signature dark, rebellious side, with collections that blend British-inspired street style with edgy details. Proof that contrasting elements can live in perfect harmony, McQ - Alexander McQueen clothing evokes a fashionable irreverence, reflecting its couture counterpart with an attitude all its own.
